A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi was awful. It was silly and disappointing. Very slap sticky. No character development. Nothing memorable. It sets up zero interest for the sequel. In 20 years no one is going to give a damn about any of these new characters. This movie wasted everything JJ Abrams did with The Force Awakens. I do not understand who thought this film should have been made. Star Wars have become Pirates of the Caribbean - Non sensical. I literally don’t care what happens next. I don’t care about Rey or Kylo of Finn or Poe. The Force Awakens had cliffhangers. There are no more cliffhangers. And the new characters are pretty dull. Also\, the title “The Last Jedi” doesn’t make sense once you see the film. The entire thing is ridiculous. Can George Lucas and Mark Hamill remake this film as a not-for-profit fan film?
